term.title: field level

item.text: Logarithm of the ratio of two values of a field quantity, usually amplitude. Levels are expressed in different ways: LF = ln(F/F0).Np, where N p is the symbol for the unit neper coherent with the SI, or LF = 20.log10(F/F0).dB, where dB is the symbol for the unit decibel.

term.citation: Citation: 'field level' in IUPAC Compendium of Chemical Terminology, 5th ed. International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry; 2025. Online version 5.0.0, 2025. 10.1351/goldbook.F02361

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
